name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: New Tab Redirect to Apps - Axlg

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension that will bring you back the classic Apps-Based New tab page!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I made this because i was using another one that was asking a lots of permissions.

This will shows you Apps Page when opening a New tab and need only 1 permission that is for redirect to chrome://apps.

v2 Updated! working again!

axl-g.com
